title: cmd/gc: comma-ok assignments should produce untyped bool as 2nd result
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/9jzOKlJSlB

produces:

prog.go:10: cannot assign bool to ok (type mybool) in multiple assignment
prog.go:13: cannot assign bool to ok (type mybool) in multiple assignment
prog.go:16: cannot assign bool to ok (type mybool) in multiple assignment

Per the latest spec from Aug 5, 2014, the 2nd value in a comma-ok assignment is an
untyped bool; i.e., these assignments are now permitted.
